00011 /**
00012 * @brief Function for setting up orientation object from rotation matrix.
00013 */
00014 void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::CreateOrient()
00015 {
00016         Matrix3x3^ AA=gcnew Matrix3x3();
00017 
00018         //Calculate the determinant of DCM
00019         double detA= rotation[0]*rotation[4]*rotation[8]
00020         -rotation[0]*rotation[5]*rotation[7]
00021         -rotation[3]*rotation[1]*rotation[8]
00022         +rotation[3]*rotation[2]*rotation[7]
00023         +rotation[6]*rotation[1]*rotation[5]
00024         -rotation[6]*rotation[4]*rotation[2];
00025 
00026         detA=1.0f;
00027 
00028         //Translate DCM multiplied by its determinant to a Matrix3x3 matrix
00029         AA->xx=detA*rotation[0];AA->xy=detA*rotation[1];AA->xz=detA*rotation[2];
00030         AA->yx=detA*rotation[3];AA->yy=detA*rotation[4];AA->yz=detA*rotation[5];
00031         AA->zx=detA*rotation[6];AA->zy=detA*rotation[7];AA->zz=detA*rotation[8];
00032 
00033         //Setup the initial Orientation object
00034         nOrient= gcnew SpinachGUI::Orientation(AA);
00035 }
00036 
00037 /**
00038 * @brief Function for updating Euler angle textboxes after calculating them from orientation.
00039 */
00040 void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::UpdateEulerAngles()
00041 {
00042         //Get euler angles from orientation object
00043         EulerAngles^ euleran=nOrient->GetAsEuler();
00044 
00045         //Convert agles from grad to degrees
00046         alpha=float(180.0f*euleran->alpha/PI);
00047         beta=float(180.0f*euleran->beta/PI);
00048         gamma=float(180.0f*euleran->gamma/PI);
00049 
00050         //set the euler textboxes
00051         textBoxalpha->Text= To_String(alpha);
00052         textBoxbeta->Text= To_String(beta);
00053         textBoxgamma->Text= To_String(gamma);
00054 }
00055 
00056 /**
00057 * brief Function for updating quaternion textboxes after calculating them from orientation.
00058 */
00059 void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::UpdateQuaternion()
00060 {
00061         //Get quaternion parameters from orientation object
00062         Quaternion^ quater=nOrient->GetAsQuaternion();
00063 
00064         //set the quaternion textboxes
00065         textBoxquat1->Text= To_String(quater->w);
00066         textBoxquat2->Text= To_String(quater->x);
00067         textBoxquat3->Text= To_String(quater->y);
00068         textBoxquat4->Text= To_String(quater->z);
00069 }
00070 
00071 /**
00072 * brief Function for updating angle axis textboxes after calculating them from orientation.
00073 */
00074 void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::UpdateAngleAxis()
00075 {
00076         //Get angle axis parameters from orientation object
00077         AngleAxis^ angleax=nOrient->GetAsAngleAxis();
00078 
00079         //set the angle axis textboxes
00080         textBoxangle1->Text= To_String(angleax->x);
00081         textBoxangle2->Text= To_String(angleax->y);
00082         textBoxangle3->Text= To_String(angleax->z);
00083         textBoxangle4->Text= To_String(180.0f*angleax->angle/PI);
00084 }
00085 
00086 /**
00087 * @brief Function for updating rotation matrix textboxes.
00088 */
00089 void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::UpdateRotation()
00090 {
00091         //set the rotation matrix textboxes
00092         XXtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[0]);
00093         XYtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[1]);
00094         XZtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[2]);
00095         YXtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[3]);
00096         YYtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[4]);
00097         YZtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[5]);
00098         ZXtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[6]);
00099         ZYtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[7]);
00100         ZZtextBox->Text= To_String(rotation[8]);
00101 }

00103 /**
00104 * @brief EventHandler for text inside angle axis , angle textbox.
00105 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00106 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00107 */
00108 System::Void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::textBoxangle_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00109 {
00110         //If key pressed is not number, or .  or - or backspace or enter do nothing
00111         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '-' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00112         {
00113                 e->Handled = true;
00114         }
00115         else
00116         {
00117                 //When enter is hitted 
00118                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00119                 {
00120                         double result;
00121 
00122                         //if valid number is entered
00123                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, result))
00124                         {
00125                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
00126                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00127 
00128                                 //Collect angle axis parameters from textboxes
00129                                 nangleaxis=Convert::ToDouble(((TextBox^)sender)->Text)*PI/180.0f;
00130                                 Vector3d naxis= Vector3d(Convert::ToDouble(textBoxangle1->Text),
00131                                         Convert::ToDouble(textBoxangle2->Text),
00132                                         Convert::ToDouble(textBoxangle3->Text));
00133 
00134                                 //Set up orientation object from angle axis parameters
00135                                 nOrient= gcnew SpinachGUI::Orientation(gcnew AngleAxis(naxis.x(),
00136                                         naxis.y(),
00137                                         naxis.z(),
00138                                         nangleaxis));
00139 
00140                                 //Convert to rotation matrix
00141                                 Matrix3x3^ dc=nOrient->GetAsDCM();
00142                                 rotation[0]=dc->xx;rotation[1]=dc->xy;rotation[2]=dc->xz;
00143                                 rotation[3]=dc->yx;rotation[4]=dc->yy;rotation[5]=dc->yz;
00144                                 rotation[6]=dc->zx;rotation[7]=dc->zy;rotation[8]=dc->zz;
00145 
00146                                 //Update rotation matrix, quaternion, euler-angles texttboxes
00147                                 CreateOrient();
00148                                 UpdateEulerAngles();
00149                                 UpdateQuaternion();
00150                                 UpdateRotation();
00151 
00152                                 //Update 3D visualization
00153                                 OpenGL->UpdateDisplay(UpdateType::ELLIPSOIDS);
00154                         }//if not valid number do nothing
00155                         else e->Handled = true;
00156                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
00157                 else ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Highlight;
00158         };
00159 }

00166 System::Void SpinachGUI::RefFrameOrientationDialog::textBoxEuler_KeyPress(System::Object^  sender, System::Windows::Forms::KeyPressEventArgs^  e) 
00167 {
00168         //If key pressed is not number, or .  or backspace or enter do nothing
00169         if (!Char::IsNumber(e->KeyChar) && e->KeyChar != '.' && e->KeyChar != '-' && e->KeyChar != '\b' && e->KeyChar !=(char)13)
00170         {
00171                 e->Handled = true;
00172         }
00173         else
00174         {
00175                 //When enter is hitted 
00176                 if (e->KeyChar ==(char)13)
00177                 {
00178                         double textfield;
00179 
00180                         //if valid number is entered
00181                         if(Double::TryParse(((TextBox^)sender)->Text, textfield))
00182                         {
00183                                 //Returned to original color of the textbox
00184                                 ((TextBox^)sender)->BackColor=System::Drawing::SystemColors::Window;
00185 
00186                                 //Choose between alpha , beta , gamma
00187                                 switch(Convert::ToInt32((String^)(((TextBox^)sender)->Tag))) {
00188                                 case 1:
00189                                         alpha=textfield;
00190                                         break;
00191                                 case 2:
00192                                         beta=textfield;
00193                                         break;
00194                                 case 3:
00195                                         gamma=textfield;
00196                                         break;
00197 
00198                                 };
00199 
00200                                 //Set up orientation object from euler angles
00201                                 nOrient= gcnew SpinachGUI::Orientation(gcnew EulerAngles(alpha*PI/180.0f,beta*PI/180.0f, gamma*PI/180.0f));
00202 
00203                                 //Convert to rotation matrix
00204                                 Matrix3x3^ dc=nOrient->GetAsDCM();
00205                                 rotation[0]=dc->xx;rotation[1]=dc->xy;rotation[2]=dc->xz;
00206                                 rotation[3]=dc->yx;rotation[4]=dc->yy;rotation[5]=dc->yz;
00207                                 rotation[6]=dc->zx;rotation[7]=dc->zy;rotation[8]=dc->zz;
00208 
00209                                 //Update rotation matrix, quaternion, angle axis texttboxes
00210                                 UpdateRotation();
00211                                 UpdateQuaternion();
00212                                 UpdateAngleAxis();
00213 
00214                                 //Update 3D visualization
00215                                 OpenGL->UpdateDisplay(UpdateType::ELLIPSOIDS);
00216                         }//if not valid number do nothing
00217                         else e->Handled = true;
00218                 }//When normal writing is happenning the Textbox color change to blue
